section.name: Download
section.p:
Download from
SourceForge.net download page
. Jar file with name UBER is the one that runs out of box.

section.name: Make sure JDK 1.5+ is installed
section.p:
To run jmxterm, JDK 1.5 or later version is required. If you don't have JDK installed, please goto
Java SE download page
, download latest JDK and install it. In order to verify if JDK is installed as expected, run java -version command, for example.
section.source: jiaqi@happycow:~$ java -version java version "1.6.0_03" Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_03-b05) Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.6.0_03-b05, mixed mode, sharing)

section.name: And Run
section.p: Run java -jar command with downloaded jar file to open an interactive command line console. (Replace ## with the version that you download). For example
section.source: jiaqi@happycow:~$ java -jar jmxterm-0.2-uber.jar Welcome to JMX terminal. Type "help" for available commands. ?$
section.p: With --help or -h option, jmxterm shows a usage page of command line options. To find out more about how jxmterm uber jar can be called, please go to User Manual page.
